English is easy! All you need is 10 minutes a day.
This is enough to improve your speaking, listening, and even writing skills quickly.
 
With the 10-Minute English app, you are going to get better at speaking and understanding the language by expanding your vocabulary—over 500 new words in a month, each month.
 
Say «Beats me» instead of «I don’t know» and «Can’t complain» instead of «I’m fine», and you will sound perfect to all native English speakers out there.
 
Why 10-Minute English?
 
*It’s scientifically proven*
 
The method of spaced repetition enables you to remember words and expressions far better than usual lessons. Even in a year, you will be able to recall 90% of everything you have learned.
 
10-Minute English employs a learning technique recognized by the best world’s universities. Breaking down big topics into smaller parts allows you to learn the most valuable information in less time, be it common English collocations, idioms, or grammar rules.
 
Our word-building exercises activate your visual memory and improve your language skills. Get one step ahead of everyone who studies English.
 
*It gets you speaking right away*
 
The first 500 most popular words and phrases will serve as a powerful boost for your English. You will learn to describe your life, socialize and speak in the workplace more confidently.
 
*You learn fast*
 
In 3 months, you will cover a language program designed for a one-year college course.
 
Choose the most compelling ones from 40 up-to-date topics: Travelling and Life in a big city, Business and Job interview, Slang, Hobbies, and many more. Learn top 100 verbs and adverbs to see the improvement immediately.
 
Your aspiration means everything. It doesn’t matter that you don’t have much time to spend on your English studies. Start off with only 10 minutes a day, and this will work wonders for your skills.
 
Begin now, and you’re going to be surprised how good at English you really are.

Welcome to Keiki World! Fun learning games, colorful worksheets, interactive cartoons, and more essential activities for your little one.

It’s a dream come true: your child plays and learns new things at the same time!

Approved by early learning experts, Keiki meets the specific development needs of toddlers & preschoolers.

With Keiki, your child will improve 10 vital skills:
1. ABC tracing & spelling
2. Сounting ability
3. Color & shape recognition
4. Hand-eye coordination
5. Fine motor skills
6. Logical thinking
7. Problem solving
8. Creativity
9. Self confidence
10. Attentiveness & alertness

Make your kid’s screen time fun and useful with games and activities like:

• ABC Puzzles
Train your kid’s letter recognition & basic phonics. Select the missing letter and put it into an empty slot using drag and drop – you should get the full word.

• Trace Letters
Practice writing letters with your little one in a beautiful cosmic interface. The baby develops fine motility & attentiveness by tracing each letter with a finger.

• Memory Cards
Can your child find all the pairs of hidden cards? Flip the card over, remember & find its pair – it’s a great memory exercise! Topics covered: ABC, numbers, shapes, colors, animals, food, cars, toys.

• Jigsaw Puzzles
Your child has to arrange the parts of the picture together. Drag & drop each part to its proper place to get a full picture. The toddler learns to recognize shapes & colors, use imagination, logical & abstract thinking.

• Fill the Gaps
The picture appears with the empty outlines and a panel with the missing objects. Your child has to drag & drop them correctly to fill in the matching gaps. Such a game develops your kid’s attentiveness, logic, shape & color recognition.

• Funny Kids Songs
Our songs help kids learn letters, numbers, animals, body parts, colors, alphabet, phonics, and shapes. Sing along!
 
Plus: Educational Cartoons, Sort Garbage, Cooking… and even more!

The gaming environment is 100% safe and ad-free. Choose between 3 levels of difficulty in puzzles. Learn on the go with offline mode.

Our worksheets are designed to instil a love of learning and provide 400+ hours of engaging schooling.

Elmohafez app allows you to memorize the noble Qur’an according to the different qira’aat while using the Uthmani script. It also helps you memorize the Prophetic Sunnah and the mutoon (brief Islamic texts) in an easy way. All you have to do is choose the text, read it and listen to the recitation, and then record your voice as the text disappears. After the recording, the application shows the text along with your recorded voice for you to compare it and know how correct it is. You have the ability to follow your progress of memorization of the Qur’an or the books of hadeeth, and you can listen to your recording at any time.
